entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 6:53 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: WSW 39 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
